title: List of Self Assessment Calculations
description: This endpoint allows a developer to generate and return a HMRC Assist report for a tax calculation and taxpayer

reportId.description: The unique ID (UUID) of the report.

messages.description: A list of HMRC Assist 'messages' for the customer.

items.description: The body contains the message for the customer.
items.example: [ { ",Turnover and Cost of Sales", "Your cost of sales (12000) is greater than your actual income (4000). This may be an error." }, .. etc]]

body.description: The body contains the message for the customer.
body.example: Your cost of sales (12000) is greater than your actual income (4000). This may be an error.

action.description: The recommend action the customer should take.
action.example: Please read our guidance and consider amending Box 10 of your submission.

links.description: A list of help or support 'links' associated with the message body.

items.description: A list of help or support 'links' associated with the message body.
items.example: [ { ",Turnover and Cost of Sales", "Your cost of sales (12000) is greater than your actual income (4000). This may be an error." }, .. etc]]

title.description: The title text that appears before the links..
title.example: Our guidance on Turnover and Expenses can be read here.

url.description: The URL of support or help link.
